Control Name: PERF 1.5 Use guidance from your cloud provider or an appropriate partner
Control Statement: Use cloud company resources, such as solutions architects, professional services, or an appropriate partner to guide your decisions. These resources can help review and improve your architecture for optimal performance.

control_attributes.Control: PERF 1.5 Use guidance from your cloud provider or an appropriate partner
control_attributes.Subcategory: How do you select the best performing architecture?
